opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Rendon v. Florida Department of Highway Safety and Motor Vehicles

opinion:
541 U.S. 1059

RENDON ET AL.
v.
FLORIDA DEPARTMENT OF HIGHWAY SAFETY AND MOTOR VEHICLES ET AL.

No. 03-559.

Supreme Court of United States.

May 24, 2004.

1

Dist. Ct. App. Fla., 3d Dist. Certiorari granted, judgment vacated, and case remanded for further consideration in light of Tennessee v. Lane, ante, p. 509. Reported below: 832 So. 2d 141.
